mapper.sql: sys_menu.id, sys_menu.parent_id, sys_menu.label, sys_menu.title, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.router_path, sys_menu.component_path, sys_menu.perms, sys_menu.icon, sys_menu.link_path, sys_menu.query, sys_menu.menu_type, sys_menu.link_open_type, CASE sys_menu.visible WHEN '0' THEN TRUE WHEN '1' THEN FALSE END AS visible, CASE sys_menu.CACHE WHEN '0' THEN TRUE WHEN '1' THEN FALSE END AS CACHE, CASE sys_menu.view_tab WHEN '0' THEN TRUE WHEN '1' THEN FALSE END AS view_tab
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET sort = sort + 1 WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND sort >= #{sort} AND del_flag = '0'
